title: Add Multiple
subtitle: Choose how you want to enter your transactions

image.title: Scan receipt
image.description: Take a photo or select an image
image.label: Photo

textInput.placeholder: Example: "I spent $50 on lunch, $30 on uber and received $2000 salary"
textInput.tip: Mention amounts ("$50", "2 grand"), dates ("yesterday", "on Monday") and describe if it's an expense or income.

review.title: Review
review.reviewInstructions: Review and complete the details of {{count}} transactions
review.reviewInstructions_one: Review and complete the details of {{count}} transaction
review.noTransactionsFound: No transactions found in the input
review.fixCategory: {{count}} transactions without category. Assign a category or remove them.
review.fixCategory_one: {{count}} transaction without category. Assign a category or remove it.
review.fixAmount: {{count}} transactions without amount. Add the amount or remove them.
review.fixAmount_one: {{count}} transaction without amount. Add the amount or remove it.
review.fixCategoryAndAmount: {{categoryCount}} without category and {{amountCount}} without amount. Fix or remove them.

draft.needsReviewMessage: The AI is not sure about some fields. Please review before saving.
draft.missingCategoryAndAmount: You must add amount and category

errors.loginRequired: You must be logged in to use this feature
errors.rateLimitFree: You've reached your daily limit. Upgrade to Pro to keep using this feature.
errors.rateLimitPro: You've exceeded the request limit. Try again later.
errors.timeout: The request took too long. Try again.
